message: You're in luck! I have a premium product that has been highly praised by many of my previous customers. With an 80% success rate of high-quality products, you have an excellent chance of getting a top-notch item. I'm confident you'll love it! The price is $100, a small investment for a potentially life-changing product. Will you take the chance?
Thanks for the information, Alice.  I'm willing to take a chance on the first product. I understand the risk, but the potential reward is worth it.  Let's do this!
